    {{#or ../customer (if ../theme_settings.restrict_to_login '===' 0)}} {{#and ../../theme_settings.restrict_new_accounts (if ../../customer_group_id '===' 0)}} {{> components/common/login-for-pricing deactivated=true}} {{else}} {{cost.formatted}} {{/and}} {{else}} {{> components/common/login-for-pricing}} {{/or}}
    • {{/each}} {{#if cart.discount }}
